attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: this app took HOURS to download and it wouldn’t let me delete it!! also trump is a racist white supremacist who hates my people and i think he should not be in office. but tiktok helps me forget that😌✨

attributes.title: BE CAREFUL
attributes.review: I'm a very big trump fan I even have a trump blowup doll and trump 2020 painted walls but this app gave me a virus and roaches started to crawl out of my devices and that girl rom the exorcist kept on popping up and that is very against the cristian religion so DO NOT GET THIS APP MY HOUSE IS ROACH INFESTED NOW so yeah❤️

attributes.title: VOTE HIM OUT!!
attributes.review: this app is so trashy i cannot. I opened the app and a picture of his shrimp popped up. literally lost my appetite!! not to mention don’t see the need of this app when he passed away. yeah, he passed away. he overdosed on 🧚‍♂️✨𝓱𝔂𝓭𝓻𝓸𝔁𝔂𝓬𝓱𝓵𝓸𝓻𝓸𝓺𝓾𝓲𝓷𝓮 ✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: Dear:Trump
attributes.review: This app was so horrible that I had to throw up my insides and almost broke my phone because of how it’s reaction time is slow I hope this app gets deleted.

attributes.title: Crash after crash
attributes.review: I was excited to download this to keep up with President Trump but it keeps crashing. Worthless.

attributes.title: SCARY
attributes.review: After I downloaded the app, some creepy guy started appearing everywhere. He would be staring at me through my window, at the store I’m at, everything. It was terrifying

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app took forever to download, never worked, and had unhelpful information. Not worth it, don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME
attributes.review: If I could rate it 0 stars I would. Trashy, obnoxious, gross, disgusting, revolting, chaotic, stressful and so much more. It has caused me severe nerve damage every time I open the app. I am in ICU typing this. Horrible app, never again.

attributes.title: VERY DISSATISFIED
attributes.review: this app is awful!! everything is disorganized and it took forever to download. made me put in a ton of information that had nothing to do with the app. do not download

attributes.title: Horrible do not recommend
attributes.review: The app was horrible. It hacked into my WiFi and stole all my anime photos. I miss my bokuto photo 😭😭. Horrible app do not recommend. Hacks into your system do NOT download
